content: top hole figure 3 cinch tightly and this will make the 1st segment repeat opposite side to divide the pumpkin into two equal halves figure 4 do 2 more segments in each half until you have a total of 6 segments blossom bottom optional if you omit this step sew up the bottom hole using contrasting yarn stem color yarn and repeatedly stitch through the base until you have enough color fiqure 5 stem using tails from stem sew onto top of pumpkin hide all tails inside pumpkin ta da you re done kiki geiger designs ● © october 2019 kikigeigerdesigns blogspot com ● ravelry kiki geiger ● thebrowndog etsy com figure 1 fiqure 2 figure 3 figure 4 figure 5 kiki geiger designs ● © october 2019 kikigeigerdesigns blogspot com ● ravelry kiki geiger ● thebrowndog etsy com
